scriptLines: Customers as (Customer as ({@id} as short, CompanyName as ({@Address} as short, {@Name} as string)))

stringify1 parse(column1 = column1 ? (Customer as ({@id} as integer,

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	parameter1 as string[] (['a','b'])
}
source(output(
		acctnum as string,
		fullname as string,
		phone as string,
		zip as string,
		xml as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 parse(customers = xml ? (Customers as (Customer as integer,
		CompanyName as string)),
	format: 'xml',
	namespaces: true) ~> Parse1
Parse1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

source(output(

		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source
source derive(each(match(like(lower(name),'%year%')), $$ = toInteger($$)+10),
	partitionBy('hash', 6,
		movie
	)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['drift.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(contains(array(columns()),isNull(#item)),
	disjoint: false) ~> LookForNULLs@(hasNULLs, noNULLs)
LookForNULLs@hasNULLs sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,

source1 filter(title == 'Fury') ~> Filter2

source(output(
		{@context} as string[],
		geometry as (coordinates as double[][][], type as string),
		properties as (elevation as (unitCode as string, value as double), forecastGenerator as string, generatedAt as string, periods as (detailedForecast as string, endTime as string, icon as string, isDaytime as boolean, name as string, number as short, shortForecast as string, startTime as string, temperature as short, temperatureTrend as string, temperatureUnit as boolean, windDirection as string, windSpeed as string)[], units as string, updateTime as string, updated as string, validTimes as string),
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> jsonSource
jsonSource derive(each(geometry, match(true()), $$ = $$)) ~> FlattenStructure
FlattenStructure foldDown(unroll(coordinates),
	mapColumn(
		coordinates,
		type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenArray
FlattenArray foldDown(unroll(coordinates),
	mapColumn(
		coordinates,
		type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 foldDown(unroll(coordinates),
	mapColumn(
		coordinates,
		type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
Flatten2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source3
source1 foldDown(unroll(data),
	mapColumn(
		{@context} = data.{@context},
		action = data.action,
		actor = data.actor,
		edApp = data.edApp,
		eventTime = data.eventTime,
		extensions = data.extensions,
		federatedSession = data.federatedSession,
		generated = data.generated,
		group = data.group,
		id = data.id,
		object = data.object,
		searchTerm = data.searchTerm,
		session = data.session,
		target = data.target,
		type = data.type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
window1 select(mapColumn(
		{@context},
		action,
		actor,
		edApp,
		eventTime,
		extensions,
		federatedSession,
		generated,
		group,
		id,
		object,
		searchTerm,
		session,
		target,
		type,
		newcol
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Flatten1 window(newcol = last(1)) ~> window1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 0) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 keyGenerate(output(sk as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
DerivedColumn1 window(over(dummy),
	asc(sk, true),
	prevAndCurr = lag(title,1)+'-'+last(title),
		nextAndCurr = lead(title,1)+'-'+last(title)) ~> leadAndLag
SurrogateKey1 derive(dummy = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
leadAndLag select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		year,
		sk,
		prevAndCurr,
		nextAndCurr
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(upperCase = map(columnNames(),upper(#item)),
		listIndexes = mapIndex(columnNames(),#index),
		sortarray = sort(map(columnNames(),lower(#item)), compare(#item1, #item2)),
		sliceArray = slice(array(toString(columns())),:sizeOfColumnsArray-2),
		findElements = find(columnNames(),left(toString(#item),1)=='R'),
		filterElements = filter(columnNames(),left(toString(#item),1)=='R'),
		sizeOfColumnsArray := size(array(toString(columns())))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(origin=='DerivedColumn1'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

		col
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
DerivedColumn1 derive(column1 = values(col)) ~> DerivedColumn2

	filePattern:'fdsfds.csv',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		col
	)) ~> sink1

taxiSource derive(month = split(pickup_datetime,'-')[2],
		year = split(pickup_datetime,'-')[1],
		day = split(split(pickup_datetime,' ')[1],'-')[3]) ~> decompdatetime
loans window(over(loan_status),
	asc(loan_amnt, true),
	parts = nTile(20)) ~> Window1
Window1 derive(parts = 'part'+toString(parts)) ~> DerivedColumn1
movieSource select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1

	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		year,
		month,
		day
	)) ~> taxiSink
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		year
	)) ~> movieSink
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	filePattern:'loans[n].parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		parts
	)) ~> loansSink

sources.name: moviesCSV
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 20)) ~> moviesCSV

sources.name: SQLMovies
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLMovies

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared moviesCSV = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/moviesDB.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared SQLMovies = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("maksqldb.database.windows.net", "makaw", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "Movies"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = moviesCSV,
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [year] <> "-1980"),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"RottenTomato"}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Removed columns", {{"movie", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(#"Changed column type", {{"movie", Order.Ascending}}),
  #"Merged queries" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Sorted rows", {"movie"}, SQLMovies, {"movie"}, "SQLMovies", JoinKind.LeftOuter),
  #"Changed column type 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Merged queries", {{"title", type text}, {"genres", type text}, {"year", Int64.Type}, {"Rating", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Expanded SQLMovies" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Changed column type 1", "SQLMovies", {"movie", "title", "genres", "year", "Rating", "RottenTomato"}, {"SQLMovies.movie", "SQLMovies.title", "SQLMovies.genres", "SQLMovies.year", "SQLMovies.Rating", "SQLMovies.RottenTomato"})
in
  #"Expanded SQLMovies";

	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> taxi_trip_data_input1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared taxi_fare_data_input1 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/trip_fare_1.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared taxi_trip_data_input1 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/trip_data_1.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = taxi_fare_data_input1,
  #"Merged queries" = Table.NestedJoin(Source, {"medallion", " hack_license"}, taxi_trip_data_input1, {"medallion", "hack_license"}, "taxi_trip_data_input1", JoinKind.Inner),
  #"Expanded taxi_trip_data_input1" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Merged queries", "taxi_trip_data_input1", {"medallion", "hack_license", "vendor_id", "rate_code", "passenger_count", "trip_time_in_secs", "trip_distance"}, {"taxi_trip_data_input1.medallion", "taxi_trip_data_input1.hack_license", "taxi_trip_data_input1.vendor_id", "taxi_trip_data_input1.rate_code", "taxi_trip_data_input1.passenger_count", "taxi_trip_data_input1.trip_time_in_secs", "taxi_trip_data_input1.trip_distance"}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Expanded taxi_trip_data_input1", {{"taxi_trip_data_input1.trip_time_in_secs", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(#"Changed column type", {" vendor_id"}, {{"avgtime", each List.Average([taxi_trip_data_input1.trip_time_in_secs]), type nullable number}})
in
  #"Grouped rows";

	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	validateSchema: false,

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

parameters{
	filesize as integer (10000000),
	targetsize as integer (5000000)
}
source(output(
		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt_inv as double,
		term as string,
		int_rate as double,
		installment as double,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as double,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as boolean,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as string,
		delinq_2yrs as string,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as string,
		mths_since_last_delinq as string,
		mths_since_last_record as double,
		open_acc as string,
		pub_rec as double,
		revol_bal as double,
		revol_util as double,
		total_acc as double,
		initial_list_status as string,
		out_prncp as double,
		out_prncp_inv as string,
		total_pymnt as double,
		total_pymnt_inv as string,
		total_rec_prncp as double,
		total_rec_int as double,
		total_rec_late_fee as double,
		recoveries as double,
		collection_recovery_fee as double,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as double,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as string,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as string,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as double,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as double,
		acc_now_delinq as string,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as double,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as double,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,

		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(rowcount = count(1)) ~> Aggregate1
source1 derive(column1 = sink2#output()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', (toInteger(sink2#output().rowcount)))) ~> sink1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink2
